Extract Memberships of a State

Source: R/igo_state_membership.R
igo_state_membership.Rd

Extract all the memberships of a state on a specific date.

Usage

igo_state_membership(state, year = NULL, status = "Full Membership")

Arguments

state

Any valid name or code of a state as specified on states2016. It could be also a vector of states

year

Year to be assessed, an integer or an array of year. If NULL the latest year available of the state would be extracted.

status

Character or vector with the membership status to be extracted. See Details on igo_year_format3.

Value

A dataframe.

See also

igo_year_format3, igo_search_states(), states2016.

Examples

# Memberships on two different dates
igo_state_membership("Spain", year = 1850)
#>   ccode stateabb statenme state year ioname        category
#> 1   230      SPN    Spain spain 1850    SCH Full Membership
#>                      orgname                longorgname political social
#> 1 Superior Council of Health Superior Council of Health         0      1
#>   economic
#> 1        0
igo_state_membership("Spain", year = 1870)
#>   ccode stateabb statenme state year ioname        category
#> 1   230      SPN    Spain spain 1870 ICCSLT Full Membership
#> 2   230      SPN    Spain spain 1870    ITU Full Membership
#> 3   230      SPN    Spain spain 1870    SCH Full Membership
#>                           orgname
#> 1 Intl Comm of Cape Spartel Light
#> 2              Intl Telecom Union
#> 3      Superior Council of Health
#>                                                     longorgname political
#> 1 International Commission of the Cape Spartel Light in Tangier         0
#> 2                         International Telecommunication Union         0
#> 3                                    Superior Council of Health         0
#>   social economic
#> 1      0        1
#> 2      0        1
#> 3      1        0
igo_state_membership("Spain", year = 1880:1882)
#>    ccode stateabb statenme state year ioname        category
#> 1    230      SPN    Spain spain 1880   BIPM Full Membership
#> 2    230      SPN    Spain spain 1880 ICCSLT Full Membership

# Last year
igo_state_membership("ZAN")[, 1:7]
#>   ccode stateabb statenme    state year ioname        category
#> 1   511      ZAN Zanzibar zanzibar 1964    CEC Full Membership
#> 2   511      ZAN Zanzibar zanzibar 1964    ITU Full Membership
#> 3   511      ZAN Zanzibar zanzibar 1964     UN Full Membership
#> 4   511      ZAN Zanzibar zanzibar 1964    UPU Full Membership

# Use codes to get countries
igo_state_membership("2", year = 1865)
#>   ccode stateabb                 statenme state year ioname        category
#> 1     2      USA United States of America   usa 1865 ICCSLT Full Membership
#>                           orgname
#> 1 Intl Comm of Cape Spartel Light
#>                                                     longorgname political
#> 1 International Commission of the Cape Spartel Light in Tangier         0
#>   social economic
#> 1      0        1

# Extract different status

igo_state_membership("kosovo",
  status = c(
    "Associate Membership",
    "Observer",
    "Full Membership"
  )
)
#>   ccode stateabb statenme  state year ioname             category
#> 1   347      KOS   Kosovo kosovo 2014   ACCT Associate Membership
#> 2   347      KOS   Kosovo kosovo 2014   EBRD      Full Membership
#> 3   347      KOS   Kosovo kosovo 2014   IBRD      Full Membership
#> 4   347      KOS   Kosovo kosovo 2014    IFC      Full Membership
#> 5   347      KOS   Kosovo kosovo 2014    IMF      Full Membership
#> 6   347      KOS   Kosovo kosovo 2014   MIGA      Full Membership
#>                                          orgname
#> 1                             Francophone Agency
#> 2 European Bank for Reconstruction & Development
#> 3                                     World Bank
#> 4                      Int'l Finance Corporation
#> 5                             Intl Monetary Fund
#> 6       Multilateral Investment Guarantee Agency
#>                                                          longorgname political
#> 1                                   Agence de La Francophonie (ACCT)         0
#> 2            European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD)         0
#> 3 International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (World Bank)         0
#> 4                            International Finance Corporation (IFC)         0
#> 5                                        International Monetary Fund         0
#> 6                    Multilateral Investment Guarantee Agency (MIGA)         0
#>   social economic
#> 1      1        0
#> 2      0        1
#> 3      0        1
#> 4      0        1
#> 5      0        1
#> 6      0        1

# Vectorized
igo_state_membership(c("usa", "spain"),
  year = 1870:1871
)
#>   ccode stateabb                 statenme state year ioname        category
#> 1     2      USA United States of America   usa 1870 ICCSLT Full Membership
#> 2     2      USA United States of America   usa 1871 ICCSLT Full Membership

# Use countrycodes package to get additional codes
if (requireNamespace("countrycode", quietly = TRUE)) {
  library(countrycode)
  IT <- igo_state_membership("Italy", year = 1880)
  IT$iso3c <- countrycode(IT$ccode,
    origin = "cown",
    destination = "iso3c"
  )
  head(IT)
}
#>   ccode stateabb statenme state year ioname        category
#> 1   325      ITA    Italy italy 1880   BIPM Full Membership
#> 2   325      ITA    Italy italy 1880   ECCD Full Membership
#> 3   325      ITA    Italy italy 1880 ICCSLT Full Membership
#> 4   325      ITA    Italy italy 1880 IPentC Full Membership
#> 5   325      ITA    Italy italy 1880    ITU Full Membership
#> 6   325      ITA    Italy italy 1880    SCH Full Membership
#>                                      orgname
